New Records: Gous-Harmeet partnership of 91 is the second highest for the sixth-wicket in all T20Is
Key Match Events: Keshav Maharaj bowled with figures of 1 for 24
Tabraiz Shamsi took a wicket with his first ball
Kagiso Rabada took the first wicket for South Africa
Steven Taylor hit a six and a four in the opening over
South Africa posted the highest score in Antigua with 194
Saurabh Netravalkar bowled a spell of 2 for 21
Corey Anderson took a catch to dismiss Reeza Hendricks
Quinton de Kock brought up his first fifty of the tournament off 26 balls
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Jones captained USA in place of the injured Monank Patel
South Africa included two spinners in their lineup
Post-Match Reflections: USA showed they have the capability to compete at this level
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA's fielding was exceptional with notable catches by Corey Anderson, Shayan Jahangir, and Ali Khan
South Africa's women's team lost a close ODI match against India
